statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE alert_type = 'Speeding' AND designated_route = 'Route A';
DELETE FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND current_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE alert_type = 'Emergency' AND created_at < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE designated_route = 'Route A' AND current_location = 'Location X';
DELETE FROM Alert WHERE alert_id = 100 AND vehicle_id = 200
DELETE FROM Route WHERE ending_point = 'City B' AND starting_point = 'City A'
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'High Speed';
